scripts.clean: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Cleaning build caches...'; Write-Host ''; if (Test-Path 'log') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'log' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed log directory' }; if (Test-Path '.vite') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.vite' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed root .vite cache' }; if (Test-Path 'node_modules/.vite') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'node_modules/.vite' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed Vite cache in node_modules' }; if (Test-Path 'src-tauri/target') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'src-tauri/target' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed Rust build target directory' }; if (Test-Path '.trae') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force '.trae' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed Trae AI cache directory' }; if (Test-Path 'dist') { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force 'dist' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Write-Host '[OK] Removed old dist directory' }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'dist' -Force | Out-Null; Write-Host '[OK] Created empty dist directory to satisfy Tauri configuration'; if (Test-Path 'index.html') { Copy-Item -Path 'index.html' -Destination 'dist/index.html' -Force; Write-Host '[OK] Copied index.html to dist directory' }; Write-Host ''; Write-Host 'Cache cleanup complete!'"
scripts.clean:build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean:dev: npm run clean && powershell -Command "$env:VITE_FORCE_DEV_LOGS='true'; npm run build" && npm run tauri:dev
scripts.tauri:dev: concurrently -k "npm run dev" "wait-on http://127.0.0.1:1422 && tauri dev"
